lead_paragraph: Gov. Jay Nixon appointed a Democratic county treasurer on Tuesday to replace Tom Schweich, the Republican state auditor who fatally shot himself earlier this year.

headline.main: Missouri: County Treasurer Chosen to Replace State Auditor
headline.print_headline: Missouri: County Treasurer Chosen To Replace State Auditor

snippet: Gov. Jay Nixon appointed a Democratic county treasurer on Tuesday to replace Tom Schweich, the Republican state auditor who fatally shot himself earlier this year.
